[93mdiseases[0m, but the [93misoform[0m-[93mspecific[0m [93meffects[0m [93mremain[0m [93mpoorly[0m [93munderstood[0m. [93mHypochlorous[0m [93macid[0m ([93mHOCl[0m), [93munknown[0m. [93mMethods[0m: [93mWe[0m [95minvestigated[0m the [93meffects[0m of [93mHOCl[0m and [93mMPO[0m-[93mderived[0m [93moxidants[0m on [93mtwo[0m [93mhuman[0m [93mexhibited[0m [93mchlorination[0m at [93mmultiple[0m [93mtyrosine[0m [93mresidues[0m, [93mparticularly[0m [93m3[0m,[93m5[0m-[93mdichlorotyrosine[0m, while [93mshowing[0m These [93misoform[0m-[93mspecific[0m [93mpatterns[0m [93mtranslated[0m into [93mfunctional[0m [93mdifferences[0m: [93mTE2[0m [93mdemonstrated[0m [93menhanced[0m [93mcoacervation[0m , [93mwhereas[0m [93mTE6[0m [93mshowed[0m [93mreduced[0m [93massembly[0m [93mcapacity[0m, [93mconsistent[0m with [93mstructural[0m [93mdestabilization[0m. [93mConclusion[0m: [93mHOCl[0m and [93mMPO[0m-[93mderived[0m [93moxidants[0m [93minduce[0m [93mdistinct[0m [93mmodifications[0m in [93mtropoelastin[0m [93misoforms[0m, [93mresulting[0m in [93mdivergent[0m [93meffects[0m on [93mprotein[0m [93mself[0m-[93massembly[0m. - [93mFabrication[0m of [93mfluorescent[0m [93msupramolecular[0m [93morganic[0m [93mframeworks[0m through [93mhost[0m-[93mguest[0m [93minteractions[0m and [93mtheir[0m [93mapplication[0m in [93mratiometric[0m [93mdetection[0m of [93mI[0m().: The [92mconstruction[0m of [93mfluorescent[0m [93msupramolecular[0m [93morganic[0m [93mframeworks[0m ([93mSOFs[0m) through [93mhost[0m-[93mguest[0m [93minteractions[0m not only [93menables[0m the [92mconstruction[0m of [93mfunctional[0m [95maggregates[0m with [93mdiverse[0m [93mstructures[0m, but [93malso[0m [93meffectively[0m [93mregulates[0m the [93mluminescence[0m [93mproperties[0m of the [93mmolecules[0m. [93mHerein[0m, [93mwe[0m [93msynthesized[0m a [93mchalcone[0m [93mbased[0m [93mfluorescent[0m [93mamphiphilic[0m [93mmolecule[0m ([93mmolecule[0m [93m1[0m). [93mMolecule[0m [93m1[0m [93mcould[0m [95maggregate[0m into [93mnanospheres[0m, with the [93memission[0m [93mcolor[0m [93mchanging[0m from [93myellow[0m to [93mgreen[0m. The [93mredox[0m [93mreaction[0m between [93mI[0m - and [93mAuNCs[0m [93minduces[0m [93mfluorescence[0m [93mquenching[0m of [93mAuNCs[0m and no [91mchange[0m to the [93mfluorescence[0m [93mintensity[0m of the [93m1[0m/[93mγ[0m-[93mCD[0m [93mcomplex[0m, [93mresulting[0m in a [93mlow[0m [93mdetection[0m [93mlimit[0m of [93m0[0m.[93m042[0m [93mμM[0m.
